title: Azure DevOps Analytics/Widget Issues
description: Customer-facing scoping questionnaire for Boards issues

requiredFields:
Organization Name
  What is the name of the organization?

Affected Project(s)
  Which project(s) are impacted?

Affected Team(s)
  Which team(s) are experiencing the issue?

Issue Description
  A detailed description of the issue (if not already provided in the ticket).

Issue Start Time
  When did the issue begin?

Previous Functionality
  Did this functionality work previously, or has it never worked?

Error Details
  What is the error message returned?
  Do you have any screenshots of the error?

Network Trace
  If possible, could you please capture a network trace using Fiddler or your browser's DevTools the issue? The resulting files can be uploaded to the provided File Transfer link:
  • [Capture a browser trace for troubleshooting - Azure DevOps | Microsoft Learn](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/devops/user-guide/capture-browser-trace?view=azure-devops&tabs=microsoft-edge)
  • [How to collect a network trace | Microsoft Learn](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/azure-web-pubsub/howto-troubleshoot-network-trace)

Widget Details *(if applicable)*
  What is the name of the widget being used?
  Can you please send a screenshot of its configuration?

Analytics/OData Report Details *(if applicable)*
  Can you please send the queries used and the data returned?

Comparison Behavior
  What is the behavior of the equivalent query or widget when used in a regular WI query?

Dashboard Type *(if applicable)*
  Is the dashboard a project dashboard or a team dashboard?

Data Discrepancies *(if applicable)*
  If you're seeing data discrepancies:
  • Where are you seeing the discrepancies?
  • How was the data obtained?
  • Is the data only incorrect some of the time, or all of the time?
  • Compared to what?
